What is Ianseo?
Ianseo is a software for managing the results of an Archery Tournament; it is an Open Source Project developed thanks to the Italian Archery Federation's financial support, that decided to freely distribute it in whole Europe. Translated in several languages, Ianseo is the most up to date and advanced in the world integrating all the World Archery rules, but has evolved to include a comprehensive management of an Archery Tournament as a whole: from accreditation of the athletes and officers to every kind of printouts utilities, from network and online integration to field-of-play design.

Dart Scoreboard App is designed for darts lovers.
With this app you can easily count points while playing Cricket and X01 darts games with your friends. App calculates all points, statistics and automatically determines the winner. In the application you can choose the number of players, the game mode and the number of points. It is also possible to save games and play them later.

summary.label:
Build Lineup is a formation creator app for soccer lovers. While being free, it's highly customizable and offers many features:

Easily drag and drop players to change their positions, or simply choose a football formation template.
Edit player name and jersey number.
Add a sub to player.
Add an arrow to players to show the area of influence.
Create 5-a-side, 6-a-side, 7-a-side, 8-a-side, 9-a-side, 10-a-side, or a classic lineup with 11 players.
Change team jersey colors. You can also choose different colors for your goalkeeper or other players by tapping them and clicking Jersey tab.
Choose a field color.
Choose jersey type: Plain or striped.
Download your lineups as images. This will save your lineups in camera roll, so that you can share them easily!
Store your plays in a list with the ability to edit and copy them. This makes it especially easy for football coaches to reuse roster details. No need to enter squad details each time you design a lineup for your team.
